title: WTB: T206 Larry Doyle w/ Bat with various backs

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Larry Doyle w/ Bat with various backs
posts.post_content:
All:

I am looking to put together a Backs set of the Larry Doyle w/Bat T206 card. I have about seven backs already. I'm looking to add to this number. Not looking for high grade cards; budget doesn't allow it. 

Please let me know what you have. 

Thanks!
